table.name: vtiger_productcat
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_productcat` (`productcatid` int(11) NOT NULL, `productcatno` varchar(100) default NULL, `productcat_tks_productname` varchar(100) default NULL ,`productcat_tks_cat` varchar(100) default NULL ,`productcat_tks_finish` varchar(100) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`productcatid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_productcatcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_productcatcf` (`productcatid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`productcatid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_productcat_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_productcat_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_productcat_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
